parameter.name: DurationNoAggregation
parameter.description: Duration in seconds when the record will bypass aggregation as a single record even if it's a partial.

parameter.name: DiscardLocalSGW
parameter.description: Node parameter to discard local sGWRecords. Values can be 0 for not discarding, 1 for discarding them.

parameter.name: ProcessRG0Records
parameter.description: Node parameter to enable or disable the processing of pGWRecord container with Rating Group 0. Values can be 0 for filtering them from further processing and 1 for processing them. The node parameter enables/disables the RG0 records for all switch types.

parameter.name: LocalIMSIPrefixes
parameter.description: A comma separated list of local IMSI prefixes. For example 42502,42515.

parameter.name: AlarmThreshold
parameter.description: A threshold for raising an alarm if the number of total rejected records during the day go over it. Only one alarm is raised during the day if threshold is reached and both the alarm and the number of rejected records is reset at scheduled time.

storage.name: INV_PGW_IMSI
storage.description: Storage for pGWRecords with invalid servedIMSI.

storage.name: INV_PGW_RECOPENTIME
storage.description: Storage for pGWRecords with invalid recordOpeningTime

storage.name: INV_PGW_LISTSERVDATA
storage.description: Storage for pGWRecords with missing listOfServiceData (no containers).

storage.name: INV_SGW_IMSI
storage.description: Storage for sGWRecords with invalid servedIMSI.

storage.name: INV_SGW_RECOPENTIME
storage.description: Storage for sGWRecords with invalid recordOpeningTime.

storage.name: INV_SGW_CHANGETIME
storage.description: Storage for sGWRecords with invalid changeTime.

storage.name: INV_SGW_APN
storage.description: Storage for sGWRecords with invalid apn.

storage.name: INV_SGSN_SGSNADDRESS
storage.description: Storage for sgsnPDPRecords with invalid sgsnAddress.s

storage.description: Storage for sgsnPDPRecords with invalid ggsnAddressUsed.

storage.description: Storage for sgsnPDPRecords with invalid servedIMSI.

storage.description: Storage for sgsnPDPRecords with invalid recordOpeningTime.

storage.description: Storage for sgsnPDPRecords with invalid changeTime.
